AgendaItems.Title: Confirmation of the Minutes of 24th Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Minutes of the 24th Finance Committee meeting held on May 02, 2014, were circulated and confirmed.

AgendaItems.Title: Action taken on the decision of the 24th Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee noted the action taken report.

AgendaItems.Title: Financial Status of the Institute as on December 31, 2014
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee noted the present financial status and advised prioritizing ongoing construction works based on availability of funds.

AgendaItems.Title: Annual Accounts for 2013-14
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee perused and approved the Annual Accounts of the Institute for 2013-14.

AgendaItems.Title: Audit Report on the accounts for 2013-14
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee perused and approved the Audit Report forwarded by Indian Audit & Accounts Department, and advised placing an Action Taken Report on audit observations before the committee.

AgendaItems.Title: Annual Report for 2013-14
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee approved the Annual Report of the Institute for 2013-14.

AgendaItems.Title: Recommendations of 32nd Building & Works Committee
AgendaItems.Details: Approved recommendations with observations; deviated items to be reported with justification. Delays in execution were noted and steps suggested.

AgendaItems.Title: Sanction of Rs. 16,827/- from TEQIP-II for airfare cancellation
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee approved reimbursement of Rs. 16,827/- for cancellation of air tickets of 4 faculty members.

AgendaItems.Title: Depositing Monthly NPS Contribution and transferring arrears
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee perused and approved the proposal for monthly contributions and transfer of arrears to individual PRAN accounts.

AgendaItems.Title: Enhancement of Special Compensatory Allowances
AgendaItems.Details: Approved enhancement of various allowances as per Government of India OMs, and recommended informing MHRD.

AgendaItems.Title: Air Journey on LTC/HTC for Non-Teaching Staff
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee suggested sending a consolidated proposal to MHRD for concurrence.

AgendaItems.Title: Present Status of TEQIP-II Project
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee noted the status and praised project activities and benefits derived.

AgendaItems.Title: Physical & Financial Statement of ongoing construction works/projects
Any other item with the permission of the Chair

SubItems.Title: Provision for leave encashment and superannuation/pensionary liabilities
SubItems.Details: Approved provision of funds on accrual basis for 62 listed employees as per new accounting system.

SubItems.Title: Managing General Provident Fund Contribution
SubItems.Details: Approved and authorized Director to frame mechanism for settlement of GPF issues; investment of funds to follow MHRD guidelines and recommendations of the Investment Committee.

FinanceCommitteeMinutes.Closure: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
